_header: Know ere thou knit Prove ere thou praise it
Subjects: marriage, advice on; advice, on marriage
_description: Against hasty marriage — five long lines (abbaa)

BodDig196.First Lines:
know or thow knytte prove or thow preyse ytȝyf þou know
                    or þou knyt þan mayst þou abate…
BodDig196.Last Lines:
…Ther fore avyse þe er þou þe knot knytteffor
                    had y wyst commeth to late for to lowse yt
